mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.data1 AS "data1", a.state AS "state", a.type AS "type", a.data2 AS "data2"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, data1, state, type, data2 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{data1}, #{state}, #{type}, #{data2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE material SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, data1 = #{data1}, state = #{state}, type = #{type}, data2 = #{data2} WHERE id = #{id}
